article_title: Cognizant Revenue Continues to Grow on Health Care
article_text:
Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. reported a better-than-expected 24% jump in revenue on another strong quarter in the company’s health-care segment. Profit rose 12%.

The information-technology provider also said it expects fourth-quarter earnings of at least 77 cents on revenue of at least $3.23 billion. For the full year, the company estimates earnings of at least $3.03 on revenue of at least $12.41 billion.
